LanguageData.MapPreview.Title: Map Preview
LanguageData.MapPreview.Settings.EnableTrueTerrainCol: Use true terrain colors (enables support for terrain added by mods, also applies to Map Reroll)
LanguageData.MapPreview.Settings.EnableExactPreviewGe: Use exact preview generator (slightly slower, but more accurate and supports map features added by mods)
LanguageData.MapPreview.World.WaitForPreview: There is a map preview currently generating, please wait before continuing...
LanguageData.MapPreview.PreviewGenerationFailed: A conflict with one of your mods has caused the map preview generator to fail. Please report this on the Map Preview workshop page so that a compatibility patch can be created. After closing this message, please upload your log file and include that link in your bug report.
